items.sentence: Tom was very surprised when he heard the news.
Why does everybody think I can do this but me?
Tom would look better if he trimmed his beard.
I don't think anybody has told Tom what to do.
I suspected Tom didn't really want to do that.
I suspected Tom didn't really need to do that.
I suspected Tom didn't really have to do that.
I suspect Tom can't do that without some help.
I suspect Tom and Mary are worried about that.
I want to know the truth about my son's death.
